to give or offer something for a decision to be made by others

the evaluation or estimation of the nature, quality, or ability of a student
a high degree of skill or expertise in something
the process by which a school or program is recognized as meeting certain standards

student_life.tip: a person who has successfully completed a course of study, especially at university level
